heading: HB05583
0: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE USE OF THE RICE SUBSIDY AS PROVIDED FOR UNDER THE PANTAWID PAMILYANG PILIPINO PROGRAM (4Ps) IN THE GENERAL APPROPRIATIONS ACT OF 2019 FOR THE PURCHASE OF PALAY FROM FARMERS, MANDATING FOR THE PURPOSE THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT (DSWD), IN COORDINATION WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA) AND THE NATIONAL FOOD AUTHORITY (NFA), TO BUY PALAY FROM LOCAL FARMERS, AND DISTRIBUTE RICE SUBSIDY IN THE FORM OF ACTUAL RICE, INSTEAD OF CASH ASSISTANCE, TO QUALIFIED BENEFICIARIES
mother-bill statusstatus: Pending With Rules (Included in OB on 2020-03-11) Substituted by HB06558
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05583
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE USE OF THE RICE SUBSIDY AS PROVIDED FOR UNDER THE PANTAWID PAMILYANG PILIPINO PROGRAM (4Ps) IN THE GENERAL APPROPRIATIONS ACT OF 2019 FOR THE PURCHASE OF PALAY FROM FARMERS, MANDATING FOR THE PURPOSE THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT (DSWD), IN COORDINATION WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA) AND THE NATIONAL FOOD AUTHORITY (NFA), TO BUY PALAY FROM LOCAL FARMERS, AND DISTRIBUTE RICE SUBSIDY IN THE FORM OF ACTUAL RICE, INSTEAD OF CASH ASSISTANCE, TO QUALIFIED BENEFICIARIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLAFUERTE, LUIS RAYMUND "LRAY" JR F.
DATE FILED : 2019-11-21
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Cabatbat (000 2020-01-30)2. Alonte (000 2020-02-03)
3. Tiangco (000 2020-02-19)4. Cari (000 2020-05-20)
5. Tambunting (000 2020-05-20)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-12-09
          -The Committee approved HB 5583 with amendments. The Committee Secretariat was instructed to prepare the substitute bill and submit the same to the Committee on Appropriation for comments.
      2. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2019-12-18
      3. Scheduled for Deliberation by the Committee on Appropriations on 2020-01-16
MOTHER BILL: HB06558
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-11-27
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON APPROPRIATIONS
